sentences.sentence: One child in ten is asthmatic.
sentences.translation: 每10个孩子中有1个是患哮喘病的。

sentences.sentence: I have been an asthmatic from childhood and was never able to play any sports.
sentences.translation: 我从小就是个哮喘病人，从来不能参加任何体育运动。

sentences.sentence: He is an asthmatic who is also anaemic.
sentences.translation: 他是一个哮喘病人，并且还贫血。
